com.rivelbop.rivelworks.io

Class DualOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.PrintStream
          • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.io.DualOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleFileOutputStream

    public class DualOutputStream
extends java.io.PrintStream
    Handles two output streams simultaneously.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)
